table.name: vtiger_cbofferdetail
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cbofferdetail` ( `cbofferdetailid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `cbofferdetailno` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `related_product` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `related_client` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `quantity` DECIMAL(20) DEFAULT NULL, `unit_price` DECIMAL(16,2) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbofferdetailid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbofferdetailcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cbofferdetailcf` ( `cbofferdetailid` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbofferdetailid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
